acf.description: This is our most popular add-on! Typically at the Rehearsal Dinner, there are so many toast and speeches given, and it's almost impossible to remember what each person said even just a few days after. We would love to put these speeches together so you can remember them for a lifetime.

additions.addition: Film of all speeches in their entirety
Snippets of speeches in highlight film

acf.description: Bronze, Silver, Gold, and Platinum Package Add-On. Can't fit all of your wedding day moments into the hours listed in your package? Add additional hours to capture them all!

additions.addition: All of the time you need

acf.description: Gone are the days of being physically present to attend a wedding! With live-streaming capabilities, any family member or friend who can't make it to your ceremony or reception can watch from the comfort of their own home. We provide a 2-3 camera angle set-up with professional audio so your viewers are completely immersed in the biggest moments of your day.

additions.addition: Coverage of ceremony or reception Dances/speeches

acf.description: It's hard to fit every single clip we capture into your films. With the Raw Footage add-on, we convert all of our video files into an easy to playback format and send you a hard drive, so you don't miss anything!

additions.addition: A hard drive with the raw footage
